page.title: 22Churches in Haltwhistle
page.content:
There are three churches in Haltwhistle, The Cof E is Holy Cross which has been in the Townsince about 1530, The Methodist chapel on Westgate and The Catholic Church, St. Wilfrid,also on Westgate. The catholic church was formally the URC church. The URC and the catholic churches shared the same building for a period of time but the URC congregation diminished to such an extent that the 51% ownership of the building was sold to the catholic church who are the sole owners now.

All three of the churches work togwther in common in Haltwhistle Churches Together and have join activities including Frugal Lunches throughout lent for Christian Aid, Christian Aid week door to door collections,Good Friday procession throughout the town,
